soil_type.description: Dominant soil type: clay, sand, loam, rocky, organic

water_proximity_meters.description: Distance to nearest water source in meters

aspect_direction.description: Slope aspect: north, south, east, west, flat

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180
Invalid soil type: Use one of [clay, sand, loam, rocky, organic]
Canopy cover out of range: Must be between 0 and 100 percent

Invalid disturbance level: Use one of [minimal, moderate, high]

usage: Provide target species list and site coordinates. Optionally include detailed environmental parameters for more accurate suitability assessment.

species_match_scores.description: Individual suitability scores for each target species
